name: Slap The Bugs
description:
You have to protect your computer from bugs that come from outside because its night and the bugs like the light. Bugs come from the 2 vents that you have in your room.

You have to survive till the morning so bugs won't come in again.
Every time a bug hits your computer something is happening to your project because you are trying to export it.

Sorry for my bad english I'm trying to improve .
